outputs.output_descr:
1. Coordination and assessment capacity of the UN Resident Coordinator office is strengthened to facilitate the development of a locally owned participatory recovery plan for Saada
2. UNDP capacity gaps bridged and contribution to the formulation of the conflict sensitive recovery action plans accomplished
outputs.output_title: UN RC support to Saada Recover
